links.title: Making Money in Any Market
links.description: At first glance, convertible bonds issued by Tesla would seem at odds in a mutual fund designed to provide consistent returns and low volatility in every kind of market. Yet when Elon Musk says or does something that rattles shares of the electric-car maker, it can work to the advantage of investors in the $6.3 billion Calamos Market Neutral Income fund.

links.title: Dow futures point to a 300-digit dive at the open as global markets continue to plunge
links.description: U.S. stock index futures tanked ahead of Thursday's open, as the global market rout continued to thrash stocks. Around 4:45 a.m. ET, Dow futures sank 241 points, indicating a sharply lower open of -332.74 points. Futures on the S&P 500 dropped indicating a negative open of -28.53 points, while Nasdaq futures signaled a negative open of -72 points.
